Rank.Description: Increases your critical strike chance of your Primary Bolt abilities by 2%.
Increases your critical strike chance of your Primary Bolt abilities by 4%.
Increases your critical strike chance of your Primary Bolt abilities by 6%.

Decreases the cast time of your Fire spells by 4% and all other spells by 1%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Fire spells by 4%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 1 meter. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Dominator's Mental Fortitude.

Decreases the cast time of your Fire spells by 8% and all other spells by 2%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Fire spells by 8%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 2 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Dominator's Mental Fortitude.

Decreases the cast time of your Fire spells by 12% and all other spells by 3%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Fire spells by 12%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 3 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Dominator's Mental Fortitude.

Decreases the cast time of your Fire spells by 16% and all other spells by 4%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Fire spells by 16%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 4 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Dominator's Mental Fortitude.

Decreases the cast time of your Fire spells by 20% and all other spells by 5%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Fire spells by 20%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 5 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Dominator's Mental Fortitude.
Reduces the amount of pushback suffered while casting single target spells by 33%.
Reduces the amount of pushback suffered while casting single target spells by 66%.
Reduces the amount of pushback suffered while casting single target spells by 100%.
Burning Bonds
Increases the damage bonus of Internalize Charge by 3%.
Increases the damage bonus of Internalize Charge by 6%.
Increases the damage bonus of Internalize Charge by 9%.
Increases the chance for your Fireball to ignite the enemy by 20%.
Increases the chance for your Fireball to ignite the enemy by 40%.
Increases the chance for your Fireball to ignite the enemy by 60%.
Reduces the duration of hostile stuns and silences cast on you by 10%.
Reduces the duration of hostile stuns and silences cast on you by 20%.
Reduces the duration of hostile stuns and silences cast on you by 30%.

Ability.Description: Removes all crowd control effects. Teleports forward 15m.

Rank.Description: Flicker
Gives your Flame Bolt spell a 33% chance on hit to increase your spell damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Gives your Flame Bolt spell a 66% chance on hit to increase your spell damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Gives your Flame Bolt spell a 100% chance on hit to increase your spell damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Increases the damage bonus Countdown gains per stack of Combust on the enemy by 2%.
Increases the damage bonus Countdown gains per stack of Combust on the enemy by 4%.
Increases the damage bonus Countdown gains per stack of Combust on the enemy by 6%.

Ability.Description: A conflagration erupts at the selected area burning up to 5 enemies within, causing 3566 Fire damage over 8s. Damage is increased by 10% for each stack of Combust on affected enemies. Generates 6 Charge every second.

Rank.Description: Fire Storm

Your Fireball casts have a 10% chance to reset and reduce the cooldown of your next 3 Flame Bolt casts to 0 seconds. Your successful Flame Bolts have a 33% chance to apply Combust to the enemy, dealing Fire damage over time. Max 3 stacks.

Your Fireball casts have a 20% chance to reset and reduce the cooldown of your next 3 Flame Bolt casts to 0 seconds. Your successful Flame Bolts have a 66% chance to apply Combust to the enemy, dealing Fire damage over time. Max 3 stacks.

Your Fireball casts have a 30% chance to reset and reduce the cooldown of your next 3 Flame Bolt casts to 0 seconds. Your successful Flame Bolts have a 100% chance to apply Combust to the enemy, dealing Fire damage over time. Max 3 stacks.

Decreases the additional damage you take while affected by Glyphs of Power by 1%. Increases the additional damage you deal while affected by Glyphs of Power by 2%. Increases the mana regeneration bonus from Glyphs of Power by 1%.

Decreases the additional damage you take while affected by Glyphs of Power by 2%. Increases the additional damage you deal while affected by Glyphs of Power by 4%. Increases the mana regeneration bonus from Glyphs of Power by 2%.

Decreases the additional damage you take while affected by Glyphs of Power by 3%. Increases the additional damage you deal while affected by Glyphs of Power by 6%. Increases the mana regeneration bonus from Glyphs of Power by 3%.

Decreases the additional damage you take while affected by Glyphs of Power by 4%. Increases the additional damage you deal while affected by Glyphs of Power by 8%. Increases the mana regeneration bonus from Glyphs of Power by 4%.

Decreases the additional damage you take while affected by Glyphs of Power by 5%. Increases the additional damage you deal while affected by Glyphs of Power by 10%. Increases the mana regeneration bonus from Glyphs of Power by 5%.
Your Burning Bonds spell no longer breaks on damage.
After being hit you have a 30% chance to receive a shield that absorbs damage up to the value of 15% of your maximum health for the next 10 seconds. This effect can occur once every 30 seconds.

Ability.Description: Grants damaging Fire spells a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Cinder Burst and allow it to be cast instantly, and reduces its mana cost by 50%. Cannot happen more than once every 10s. Counts as a Mage Armor

Rank.Description: Pyromancer's Armor

Ability.Description: Deals 1030 to 1139 Fire damage to up to 5 enemies. Stuns each enemy hit for 2s.

Rank.Description: Backdraft

Ability.Description: Reduces Fire spell cast time by 50% for 15s. Resets the cooldown on all Fire spells.

Rank.Description: Reduces the global cooldown of your Fire spells to 1.4 seconds. Reduces the cast time of your Fire spells by 4%. Reduces the mana cost of your instant Fire spells by 6% and your non-instant Fire spells by 4%.

Reduces the global cooldown of your Fire spells to 1.3 seconds. Reduces the cast time of your Fire spells by 8%. Reduces the mana cost of your instant Fire spells by 12% and your non-instant Fire spells by 8%.

Reduces the global cooldown of your Fire spells to 1.2 seconds. Reduces the cast time of your Fire spells by 12%. Reduces the mana cost of your instant Fire spells by 19% and your non-instant Fire spells by 12%.

Reduces the global cooldown of your Fire spells to 1.1 seconds. Reduces the cast time of your Fire spells by 16%. Reduces the mana cost of your instant Fire spells by 26% and your non-instant Fire spells by 16%.

Reduces the global cooldown of your Fire spells to 1 second. Reduces the cast time of your Fire spells by 20%. Reduces the mana cost of your instant Fire spells by 33% and your non-instant Fire spells by 20%.
Increases your Maximum Charge by 5.
Increases your Maximum Charge by 10.
Increases the critical hit chance of your abilities by 2%.
Increases the critical hit chance of your abilities by 4%.
Increases the critical hit chance of your abilities by 6%.
Increases the total damage of your Combust by 50% and the duration by 1 second.
Increases the total damage of your Combust by 100% and the duration by 2 seconds.
Increases the maximum stack size of your Combust by 1.
Increases the maximum stack size of your Combust by 2.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 3% of your target's Resistances.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 6% of your target's Resistances.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 10% of your target's Resistances.

The Mage's next 5 Fireball casts are instant. Lasts 15s.

The Mage's Fireball casts generate an additional Fireball on the enemy. This Fireball does not generate Charge and cannot apply Combust. Cannot occur more than once every 3s. Only 1 Mage Armor may be active at a time.
